mapper.select: WITH RankedResults AS ( SELECT C.category_NAME, A.STUDENT_NAME, SUM(B.score) AS total_score, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY C.category_NAME ORDER BY SUM(B.score) DESC) AS row_num FROM STUDENT A JOIN PRAISE B ON A.student_code = B.student_code JOIN praise_category C ON B.category_code = C.category_code and a.user_code = #{userCode} and a.student_status = 'Y' GROUP BY C.category_NAME, A.STUDENT_NAME ) SELECT category_NAME, STUDENT_NAME, total_score FROM RankedResults WHERE row_num = 1 ORDER BY total_score desc;
